Posts.Content: Hi we all feel really done and alone some time . L got a bad day today feeling lonely so use to people around me . Lost my two sisters and mother in 4years and just lost my niece who was there for me when l was going though breast cancer in both . Am ok at the moment be no when a talk to my husband is in work he been great . My son got his own family .sue X
Posts.Title: Hi would love someone to chat to I'm very lost and upset right now...
Hi would love someone to chat to I'm very lost and upset right now...
